title: Escapes Test

title: TEST Experiences Prod
description: Experience the epitome of luxury at TEST Experiences Prod, a remarkable retreat located in a vibrant city. This prestigious property boasts an array of world-class facilities, including a state-of-the-art fitness centre, a serene day spa and a selection of top-tier dining venues. Step outside and you'll find yourself surrounded by an array of attractions, from high-end boutiques to gourmet eateries and architectural marvels. When the day is done, retire to your plush suite, where opulent furnishings and breathtaking views await

title: Shenzhen Skyscraper Stay within Futian District
description: Towering over the city, Crowne Plaza Shenzhen Futian, an IHG Hotel, is a sky-high sanctuary in Shenzen's vibrant Futian district. Float in the rooftop pool and feast on delightful dishes at the MR Cafe before taking in sweeping vistas at Ping'an International Financial Center's observation deck. Indulge in retail therapy at COCO Park before savouring an ice-cold cocktail at the lobby bar and setting out to discover the pulse of Futian's nightlife.

vendor_name: Aleenta Hua Hin - Pranburi Resort & Spa
title: Ultimate Hua Hin Secluded Luxury Near Khao Sam Roi Yot National Park with Onsite Spa
description:
Unwind in the lap of sophistication at the Aleenta property that started it all - the five-star Aleenta Hua Hin - Pranburi Resort & Spa, part of the acclaimed Small Luxury Hotels of the World collection. Nestled in captivating Paknampran Bay, close to Hua Hin town and just 40 minutes from the soaring limestone mountains, otherworldly caves and champagne beaches of Khao Sam Roi Yot National Park, this resort is the ultimate secluded escape overlooking the Gulf of Thailand.

Tucked away within Thailandâ€™s historical royal seaside retreat, Hua Hin, and home to just 25 impeccable residences - some just steps from the crystal-clear ocean and others with private plunge pools - this boutique resort is nothing short of spectacular. Let this exquisite hideaway lure you in with an extensive menu of wellness treatments at Ayurah Spa, including nourishing mud treatments, body polishes, therapeutic massages and more. As part of the Ayurah Wellness retreat offerings guests can enjoy complimentary wellness classes along with personalised exercise programs led by trainers.
offer_address: 183, Pak Nam Pran, Prachuap Khiri Khan, Hua Hin, Thailand
